channel.title: Branding on Kel
channel.description: Recent content in Branding on Kel

item.title: Dairy Industry Awards
item.description: We spoke to past winners of the competitions to understand what the awards mean to them. The key themes of these discussions were that it is about the dairy cow, striving for continuous improvement, and the kiwi farming community. To represent these themes we used a cow contained in a circle shape, paired with a strong font reminiscent of old farm and small town signs. The text ‘Dairy Industry Awards’ is swapped out with the competition in question when required, and the device and text portions can be separated and used alone.
